footer.top: Welcome to my website! Here you will find information about my services, a portfolio where I share my experience and news in web development. Ready to get started or discuss a project? Contact me!

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.desc_top: My name is Roman Pomyanovsky, I am a
about.desc_bot: I specialize in creating intuitive and creative web applications. My credo is not just to write code but to craft web solutions with character. From adaptive interfaces to innovative functional features, in my world, every line of code is a step towards a unique user experience. Let's build the web world together, where every detail matters!
about.inf_1_f23: Спеціальність: Підприємництво, торгівля та біржова діяльність.
